results.before:
function summonMoloch(
        address summoner,
        address _approvedToken,
        uint256 _periodDuration,
        uint256 _votingPeriodLength,
        uint256 _gracePeriodLength,
        uint256 _abortWindow,
        uint256 _proposalDeposit,
        uint256 _dilutionBound,
        uint256 _processingReward,
        string memory _summoningStamp) public {
       
        M = new Moloch(
            summoner,
            _approvedToken,
            _periodDuration,
            _votingPeriodLength,
            _gracePeriodLength,
            _abortWindow,
            _proposalDeposit,
            _dilutionBound,
            _processingReward,
            _summoningStamp);
        
        Molochs.push(address(M));
        
        emit Summoned(address(M), summoner);
    }
results.after:
function summonMoloch(
        address summoner,
        address _approvedToken,
        uint256 _periodDuration,
        uint256 _votingPeriodLength,
        uint256 _gracePeriodLength,
        uint256 _abortWindow,
        uint256 _proposalDeposit,
        uint256 _dilutionBound,
        uint256 _processingReward,
        string calldata _summoningStamp) public {
       
        M = new Moloch(
            summoner,
            _approvedToken,
            _periodDuration,
            _votingPeriodLength,
            _gracePeriodLength,
            _abortWindow,
            _proposalDeposit,
            _dilutionBound,
            _processingReward,
            _summoningStamp);
        
        Molochs.push(address(M));
        
        emit Summoned(address(M), summoner);
    }
